name: @runejs/core
description: Core logging, networking, and buffer functionality for RuneJS applications.

scripts.copy-documents: cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp .npmignore dist && cp LICENSE dist
scripts.copy-documents:windows: copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist && copy .npmignore dist && copy LICENSE dist
scripts.package: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run copy-documents && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.package:windows: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm run copy-documents:windows && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run

author: Tynarus
